channel.title: Dharma on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)
channel.description: Recent content in Dharma on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)

item.title: The Impossibility of Truth in Equal Systems | Why Dharma Must Stand Above Consensus
item.description: Why did philosophy emerge at all?

item.title: Varna| The Natural Order We Refuse to Acknowledge
item.description: What the system provides is a default path of excellence for the vast majority, rather than leaving everyone to flounder through a pretense of unlimited choice.
